main event: A witness reported observing a large bright light that changed shape from round to triangular before disappearing behind trees.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 19 minutes,The object was silent and well developed,The light appeared to change shape during the observation,The object followed a course from south to north,This report was telephoned in by the observer.
sighted object: a large bright light changing shape
witness description: The report was provided by a witness, but additional details about them remain redacted.
